name: SantaClaritaGuide
0:
”Alexa, open Santa Clarita Guide”
”Alexa, ask Santa Clarita Guide for the top 5 things to do”
”Alexa, ask Santa Clarita Guide for local news”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: santa clarita guide
des:
This travel guide gives you a local's perspective of the top 5 things to do along with other places to visit in Santa Clarita, California. The travel guide also gives the address and contact information for the places of interest. You can also ask the guide to give the local news 
most relevant to Santa Clarita.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
